showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // “Something is written on the floor.”
{GREEN}(2) Left 10

dialogStrings:
You cannot take on anymore Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

“There's no sign of Sephiroth,
but I know I saw him go into this room…”

Do {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}
Re {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}
Mi {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}
Fa {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
So {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} or {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} + {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}
La {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} or {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} + {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}
Ti {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} or {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} + {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}
Do {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} or {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} + {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
Do Mi So (C) Directional button Down
Do Fa La (F) Directional button Left
Re So Ti (G) Directional button Up
Mi So Do (C) Directional button Right
End {PURPLE}[START]{WHITE}

“Something is written on the back
of the lid.”
{GREEN}(1) Right 36

“Something is written on the floor.”
{GREEN}(2) Left 10

“Something is written on the floor.”
{GREEN}(3) Right 59

“Something is written on the back
of the lid.”
{GREEN}(4) Right 97

Please push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to
set staff in position.

Could not position the staff,
due to a lack of funds.

Press {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to ignite the
bomb for the search.

The staff member will calculate
the tremors and dig up the buried item.
The dig point is where
the staff's line
of vision meets.

Move to the dig point
and press {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to select.
The staff will dig for the item.

“Now, the staff will dig here.
The result will be placed
in the treasure box overnight.”

“I sure was scared when Weapon attacked.
It gives me the creeps knowing there's
still two of them left.”

“Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight
mankind's worst enemy
like a real warrior.
It's not everyday you get to fight
in an inter-planetary war.”

“The President is gathering up
all the Huge Materia on the planet.
He wants to shoot it at Meteor
in the rocket.”{PAUSE}“President Rufus is different
from the older generation.
He'll protect the planet with
all of Shinra's
state of the art technology.”

“Protect it? No, I don't think so.
The President isn't the type to do
anything so heroic.
It's all just a game to him,
a question of winning or losing.”

“They've finally started collecting
the Huge Materia
from the Junon {CYAN}Underwater Reactor{WHITE}.”

“After they get it, they'll take it
to the airport and will transport
it to Rocket Town by Gelnika.
Don't let your guard down!”

“Whew…I hope everything goes all right
until we get to {CYAN}Rocket Town{WHITE}.
Then, our mission is nearly complete.”

“Not so fast. We still have one major task…
we still have to transport the stuff…”

{Red XIII}
“Can we get there
before they do?”

{Cid}
“Grrrrgh!
Just barely!
We're goin' after it!”

{Cait Sith}
“How 'bout us getting there beforehand
and stealing it back?”

{Yuffie}
“Let's get there before they do
and catch 'em!”

{Yuffie}
“Hey, where? Where? Where are they headed?”

{Cloud}
“I may be mistaken, but…
Doesn't it feel like we're missing
something?”

Release insects and frogs
by pushing {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}.
Insects and frogs react differently
differ depending on where
you release them, so try many different
places.

Push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to give up.
You will return to the Entrance.

“A scratch left by a fingernail inside
the beaker…
'Let's get out of here…'.”

“A scratch left by a fingernail inside
the beaker…
'Feeding Time'…that's our chance…!”

“Escapee Report no. 1
X Month X Day
Two escapees were located
near Midgar.”

“Escapee Report no. 2
Description at the time of capture.
A Former member of SOLDIER/Number( )
No effect could be detected from
either Mako Radiation Therapy
or Jenova on him.
B Regular/Number ( )
Reaction to Jenova detected.”

“Escapee Report no. 3
Status.
A Shot for resisting.
B Escaped during A's resistance.”

“Escapee Report no. 4
Other
B's whereabouts is currently unknown.
But pursuit is unnecessary due to
his diminishing consciousness.
Awaiting further instructions.”
